name: UPaperSpriteComponent
doc:
A component that handles rendering and collision for a single instance of a UPaperSprite asset.

This component is created when you drag a sprite asset from the content browser into a Blueprint, or
contained inside of the actor created when you drag one into the level.

@see UPrimitiveComponent, UPaperSprite

SourceSprite: The sprite asset used by this component
SpriteColor: The color of the sprite (passed to the sprite material as a vertex color)

methods.name: GetSprite
methods.doc: Gets the PaperSprite used by this instance.

methods.name: SetSprite
methods.doc: Change the PaperSprite used by this instance.
